artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Fujiokaya Keijirō; Carver: Koizumi Kanegorō
description: landscape with figures in middle ground picnicking, dancing and playing music; two pink blossoming trees at right; sailboat on water at right in middle ground; tall tree at left; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
markings: combined date and censor seal: 亥六改 {i roku aratame} (Boar 6 inspected)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Views of Famous Places in Edo (Edo meishō zue 江戸名勝圖會)
title: Sekiya Village
